SELECT A.user_id AS userId, A.partner_id AS partnerId, A.partner_name AS partnerName, A.sms_source AS smsSource, A.sms_type_id AS smsTypeId, B.sms_title AS smsTitle, B.sms_context AS smsContext, left（A.create_time, 16） AS createTime, left（A.update_time, 16） AS updateTime FROM ${tableName} A LEFT JOIN sms_type B ON A.sms_type_id = B.id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} AND A.effective = '1' ORDER BY A.create_time DESC

SELECT A.user_id AS userId, A.partner_id AS partnerId, A.partner_name AS partnerName, A.sms_source AS smsSource, A.sms_type_id AS smsTypeId, B.sms_title AS smsTitle, B.sms_context AS smsContext, left（A.create_time, 16） AS createTime, left（A.update_time, 16） AS updateTime FROM ${tableName} A LEFT JOIN sms_type B ON A.sms_type_id = B.id WHERE A.partner_id= #{partnerId} AND A.effective = '1' ORDER BY A.create_time DESC
